short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove navbars from the RA gitbook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension that helps to remove pesky navbars and outlines.
Hit the 'H' key to toggle the navbar and outline visibility!

Works on https://bootcamp.rocketacademy.co/, https://codingbasics.rocketacademy.co/ and other rocketacademy.co pages.

(Note: hiding/revealing will still trigger when the 'h' key is pressed when searching the gitbook)
